[01 Jan 2005|04:01pm] 
i love this feeling. when know one can touch me . a care free feeling that i wish could last forever. im so untouchable right now. Nothing can bother me. i finally started living in the present , not in the past. its a brand new thing im doing and it feels great. its still hard to block out somethings and its hard to get over things and realized new things..... but in the end im living in now and what i want my future to be. fuck them bitches is phrase most should live by. if you dont like me SHUT THE FUCK UP i dont want to hear why, i dont care. if you dont like me pretend i dont exisit, dont waste your precious time on trying to make me feel bad or harrass me I REALLY DONT CARE. chances are i hate you to so, go away. school is a waste of time yes, i go their to learn and get shit done , not to be sucked into pointless drama. school is a place to make accomplishments and maybe make a few friends on the way, i never wanted to go to high school or anyschoool for that fact, because i saw from older siblings and friends what it does..... its such a waste of time i wish i could just sit on a computer get my work done then go see peoepl i want to see and do things i want to do.............

anyways

new years was awesome. G*N*G i love all of you so much, it feels like iv gotten closer to all of you. i love you

so along time ago i was with this guy and it just wasnt right at all, at the time it may have seen right but now that ive lived without him iv learned its much better. actually thats been the case with everyone i have ever been out with. i m so happy im with casey cuz i know no matter what he will always be thier hes just one of thoes ppl and i love that abotu him. i hope i havent lost any family freinds from ex's familys cuz i got alogn with them all everyone, i hope thats not the way its gunna be . <3
comment here or there to be added *unless i already added you<3

new york was great i loed every second of it like i usualy do. i loved coming but i hated leaving. summer will be great. people from there are coming here for a change.... keri,kelly and hank. so summer should be good especially if i get to go back :-) sometimes i hate leaving people here but other times its better for me to leaving and just get away from this pit. yeah i missed casey and julie and i was looking forward to seeing them but it still did me good. halloween was great so was all the other days. the weddign was awesome i had a great time(ill post pics of thoes later) these are only pictures of a few things, i will get pictures of actual peopel up here soon .<3

im staying. 
well i dunno.
if im gunna stay i have to no for sure no iffys on this one.....



ive been doing a lot of thinking since i'v been up here, and iv made a a decision to stay and finish my jr year here then possibly go back my sr. year but no promises. i feel the need to be drama free for a permanant time. so ill be keeping in touch with all of you. this isnt a sure thing yet since i would terribly miss 2 people back home to death (julie and casey<3) but i really dont know, maybe itll turn out just to be a thought or maybe realtity.



i love you all,
peace<3



im thinking and thinking but then again im not at all. i just dont know i wish i could bring the 2 most important people back here with me.:-(

saturday started off with going to stockton hanging out there for a while then we all went to SF for this big haunted house thing they had it was fun . i love the city and i will be there every chance i get when i get my car. i cant wait <3 these are from homecoming tori gots queen i was so proud of her :-)<3 so today i left after 2nd period with jessica case was suppose to coem but HE JUST WALKED THE OTHER WAY .....psh whatevA...... julios was fun of course everyone just sat around and smoked me and jessica cooked hella food. got sick of off cake mix. walked home in the rain got soaking wet and cold. i bet we are gunn abe hella sick tomorrow! haha.

had this perfact song i found but i couldnt get the lyrics.... it was perfact it talked about how it is when you want somthing back but you dont know if its time yet and the person is well yeah... when i find the lyrics ill post them. but untill then this song has my name in the tittle :-) Song For Kelly Huckaby Photographs of the best time you had, windows smugded by the speed. Leaving home with our bags from Iron Street, as morning turned into California, And smoke trailed from the butt of my cigarette. Our glass house it threw rocks at all those it past. Waking up to the sound of 5 A.M. to take my turn at the wheel. Climbed up Shasta, oh how the engine ached as the sun tortured California, and old alleys turned deep at the heart of me. Murals of heros defacing the blank concrete. Vision tunneled, Mission Street, hunger beat lodged out as the engine wheezed. Still moving regardless of stable ground and this stable ground. Photographs of the best time you had, windows smugded by the speed. Leaving home with our bags from Iron street as morning turned into California.

i know its wrong right now. i know i need to wait, if i rush back in to this i know things will go wrong. its so hard to ignore you and your feeling , and to ignore mine non the less. i hate feeling like this and even worse i hate you feeling like this. it tortures me everyday. i was looking forward to today

this was a while back . but me and julie had fun<3 *i know things have changed, for somewhat the better, and if i could i would take it all back , and i hope you would to. todays as new as tomorrow. lets live one day at a time.* we share everything, even our tears<3

How can I just let you walk away Just let you leave without a trace When I stand here Taking every breath with you You're the only one who really knew me at all How can you just walk away from me When all Ican do is watch you leave? 'cause we shared the laughter and the pain And evenn shared the tears You're the only one who really new me at all So take a look at me now There's just an empty space There's nothing left here to remind me just the memory of your face Take a look at me now there's just an empty space you coming back to me is against the odds and that's what i've gotta face I wish I could just make you turn around Turn around and see me cry There's so much I need to say to you So many reasons why You're the only one who really knew me at all So take a look at me now There's just an empty space There's nothing left here to remind me Just the memory of your face Take a look at me now There's just an empty space And to wait for you is all I can do And that's what I've got to face Take a look at me now I'm just standing here And you coming back to me Is against the odds And that's a chance I've got to face So take a look at me now Take a look at me now Take a look at me now Take a look at me now Take a look at me now Take a look at me now Take a look at me now Take a look at me now

wow im so bored, i cut fredos hair today hes so beee-uuuu-tiful :-) tomorrows only thursday...... i wish it were friday. 5th period sucks so bad it long and boring and has hella annoying people in it. geez!!!!!:-( and today everyone magically decided to disappear so i hung out with arleen at lunch , i think she might be my new favorite security gaurd..... hmm but gail is hard to beat hahaa. we shared our lunches lol. <3 im redoing my bathroom now that my brothers gone ! woooohoooo and i basically have to rooms now one is my closet the other is my room room hehe. i called my brother 3 times today he didnt answer :-( out partying already. i need to call ashley and ask her abotu best buy like.... when do i start? ;-) haha....ok peace i love fredo<3

havent been home all weekend , had to leave poor chance allll alone:-(. oh well im here now. i guess i should go to school monday, didnt go thursday or friday. :-/ i miss my brother. i got a referal for wearing a hooters shirt..... got that out of the mail.... i have no idea what im doing today.

dear my kellys,
 i dont think you know how much you mean to me you make me soooo happy :-) we have been freinds for almost7 years now and we still are goign strong hahaa. wooooo im so happy that this year we have the same lunch and we do all sorts of cool stuff heh rhymed.... going to pins and needles liek everyday after school. one day we'll actually do it ;-) hehe you'll do it first though. yoru a tough cookie lol wooooo, i think its so funny how you come to school wearing somthing or your hair a certain way, and the next day everyone is doing it..... hahah you are a real trend setter haha and i love it! i love how you can pull off things non of us could..... i love how you can wear somthing that makes everyone look stupid but you look cool. actually i hate that cuz i wish i were leik that hahaa. i love how your hair changes everyday, so each days like a new adventure..... i LOVE your room. and yoru house. i remeber we never spent a day apart over summer till last summer..... and it was wierd how both of us had a shitty summer that year...... hmmmm i wonder why. i really do think you are the ebst freind anyone could ever have. i trust you with my life. fuck dem biatches , they are whack. and you are the best and everyone knows that.! wooooo i hope you come back to school soon, lunch and after school are boring now. hahaa, i was readigng my yearbook and i saw liek the 5 pages you wrote and i laughed my ass off for abotu 2 hours lol hahahaha just thinking abotu it makes me wanna cry with joy wooooooo anyways. im going to south side of ca and your going north to the bay. at least we will still be in california :-) we will have goooood times ! ;odflcvnzxdyihzopdhfbcnv i love your tattoo and all your peircings and your plugs... that i want now since you let yoru ears heal up for a while :-)and if you didnt have such small feet i would borrow your shoes all the time. i wish i could  fit in all your clothes. hahaha its funny how when i grow out of somthign i give it to you and you still have to sew it and you can wear it hahaha. kinda depressign actually :-( haha oh well.  i was listenign to all my voice messages and yorus always make me laugh if i spoke french and understood you im sure i would be laughing even more lol.i liek sinign in the car with you. i like our choice of music :-) hahahah woooo so im goign to go eat. ill call you later haa oh and i really dont kwno how to make your comments thing do that thing, i just wanetd to update for you heheee. ok well peace  k-bling
love gangsta-j

i love this song I was waiting for a cross-town in the london underground when it struck me that i've been waiting since birth to find a love that would look and sound like a movie so i changed my plans i rented a camera and a van and then i called you "i need you to pretend that we are in love again." and you agreed to i want so badly to believe that "there is truth, that love is real" and i want life in every word to the extent that it's absurd i greased the lens and framed the shot using a friend as my stand-in the script it called for rain but it was clear that day so we faked it the marker snapped and i yelled "quiet on the set" and then called "action!" and i kissed you in a style clark gable would have admired (i thought it classic) i want so badly to believe that "there is truth, that love is real" and i want life in every word to the extent that it's absurd i know you're wise beyond your years, but do you ever get the fear that your perfect verse is just a lie you tell yourself to help you get by?

my brother just left..... i cant stop crying , i didnt want him to leave. its gunna be so hard keeping it together.... i hated sayign goodbye. i wrote him one last letter and made him this huge collage of all our pictures . i dont think my and ashley are goign to do very well without him.  i just hope he stays save and nothing bad happenes and i get to see him soon.now ill try to go back to sleep in this empty house.

my brother leaves in abotu 6 1/2 hours..... i havent cried yet, but i knwo i will when i see everyone else crying..... id hate to be ashley right now... she was tellign em how much she cared for ym brother and i really dont want to see them grow apart or see them cry..... i shouldve went with them.... but it wouldve just been harder to leave.....ill eb thier to visit a lot. I LOVE YOU and ill miss you. (even though i found myself standing in your empty room smiling thinking about what color to paint it) hehe
the last ones of bill on the floor playign with the puppies. haha

saturday i went to saturday school, hung out with all my gangsters a lacy haha, then went and hung out with fredo . everything went well. today i went shopping in stockton with my 2 aunts and cousin. they bought me over 200 dollars worth of clothes and little things. i got a really cool belly button ring. and their is this store there that sells only stuff from the 50;s and 60's so i bought a marilyn monroe shirt..... they have the prettiest ones there. and a bettie page key chain and poster.... i know have every post she has I KNOW I DO. and i found a bettie page purse iv never found one before but they have one i got so excited!!!! it is 58$ so my aunt said shed get it for me for xmas which is close!!!! ah i cant wait.

saturday school tomorrow. oh yay thats if i feel like getting up at 7........... man i hate hours who ever invented this system is really stupid and i hate them. haha they use last years pictures for the off campus passes lol. i look hella scary. hm oh well. going to turn in all my applications and stuff tomorrow. best buy, pet smart. like every store in the mall (haha) and blockbuster .:-) hopefully ill get a job. any other suggestions?
BUT CHANCE IS HERE TO STAY and yes is a big tongue on my face. it belongs to a puppy we like to call sauce <3 always and forever
great fun. weekends need to be longer. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

school has been ok, for the social part atleast. i finaly got my 1st period changed. happy. not the teacher i wanted though :-/ oh well . i love being able to go off campus. oh how i love it. im going to saturday school just so i can have no hours and be sure to get off. haha. i missed danny show tonight! im sorry. i was with fredo at his grandams cuz he was textign me all day and woke me up eaaaarly this mornign cuz he had a very bad dream , then he worried me throughout the day and kept telling me to call him asap. so i did and he needed me to come see him .:-) so i did. i love you fredo!!!! i think this year and next year will be very easy and fun.....hopefully..... im not behind and im not overdone. im perfact with classes. as for all you who will be attending night school HAHAHAHAHAHAHAH that sucks....im sorry....<3 anyways sunday im going to caseys with sarah and hopefully sort out this whole band thing. i dont need to haul all my stuff over thier which is good. not till later. so peace out nukkaaasss<3

fuck school. i hate school. tomorrow is a big NO. i think ill um.... not go.... hm sounds good to kelly. i already have days im mising. 2 week of school arizona be back sunday. 2 week sin oct/nov goign to ny. loads of doctor app. next month i think i have liek 4 in sept. haha ahh good. i liek missign school. i like havign easy classes. i hate people thier, i hate homework. gah blah sdbfiasrhgiur poo i guess ill se all you beautiful people there tomorrow. BRIGHT AND FUCKING EARLY

i love fredo so much. yesterday and today was awesome. today we were in sf all day well after i got out of saturday school haha. it was so much fun. i starting feeling really sick though in my chest again so i called my mom. but it got better. i slept ont he way home. its now 140 and im home, and my brother and HELLA peopel are outside and they all want me out thier to drink with them.... but im dont down for drinking with most of his stupid freidns that i dont like, but most of them are cool. sunday (today) me julie and amy were supposed to go to santa cruz but cant so we are gunna go the weekend after school starts and then the water slides. but today and monday i want to spend as much time with fredo as possible. cuz with school starting a lot is gunna change. i mean i will still see him but i wont get to spend nights with him anymore . i wish he went to tracy so i could see him everyday .... oh well..... i love allll my freinds and i cant wait to see lacy breanna cathrine angela meg amanda krisin james duuurek buba maries not gunna be there :-( christina (all of them) mike johnny lee brian justin narissa not gunna be there no more but i did see her at teh movies then at applebees friday night :-) MANUEL tori lisa and julie will not be there :-( logan sarah amy julie i only saw a handful of these people over summer and im gunna cry when i see some of them im gunna be so happy! i havent had a good lacy laugh in a while. ok well i hate gettign up early i hate goign to bed early so i can get up early i hate homework i hate staying up during class i hate most ppl at school i hate most teacher but i will go to see these people<3 i love you alfredo!

went to orientation today WOW i hate all of those people.... me and julie got in and out as fast as possible it was horrible but then after we went shopping and visited amy at work and eveyrthign was good, now im tierd and i miss my baby:-( but then again im kinda angry but then again i love him. but then again i dunno geezuz.<3 i hate school i hate everything having to do with school i hate it i hate it i hate it!!!!!!!!!! i dred going back i dred having to sit in class for 7 hours i dred getting up early I HATE IT!!!!!!!!!!!GAHHHHHH

camping was so much fun! got up at 630 to see the face of heather! and michelle. it wass great then alfredo came over at 7 and then we left long ride up as usual, but we were all used to it:-) not alfredo though :-(. when e got there we went to the beacj went swimming and had fun. i love yosemite so incredibly much my parents have been going thier since they were 17 and iv been goign my whole live every summer , winter, and spring. usualy we stay for a week but my dad had to be here to take my brother to arizona for school blah! sucks ..... anyways, i played tour guide since me heather and michelle know this place liek the back of our hand. i really wanted to go to half dome again but we didnt have anytime:-( alfredo would hve never made it muah ahahha haha. we saw TONS of bears and coyotes. and when we went out to eat thier was this sign with a person feeding a squirral and then it was crossed out , so i told alfrdo he coulnt feed them. but then i sat on the ground and fed them by hand. :-) they like me, im like pocahontus :-) im good with animals<3 hehe we slept on the beach. and really it was the prettiest night sky i have ever seen, the stars actually twinkled liek in the movies i saw 5 shooting stars in one night, it was great. before we left we went to glacier point and took pictures and hiked around and had fun. i cant wait till next summer that is goignto be the best summer ever. 6 days backpackign with my dad through the canyons over to litle yosemite back up half dome then finaly down to the valley. the scenery is absolutly beaautiful. i would pick nature of the city anyday. wierd but i would.<3 i still want to be there with heather and michelle and jenny and kellie but oh well i will see them soon. TONS OF PICTURES COMING IN A FEW DAYS!

i gotta to go shopping with cathrine for angulas bday! this afternoon, then went to algulaaas for kareoke!!!!! my throat hurts hahah we sang and daced it up it was good times, HAPPY BIRTHDAY ANGELA!<3 it was good good to see everyone thats liek the most peoel i was allll summer!<3 it was fun. i love mikes dog i want one i think im gunna take his:-) leaving for camping early tomorrow morning i will be back wednesdayyyy!!!! so peace to all you <3 i didnt get tot ake lots of pics cuz i was to busy having fun !! hahah but here are a few

today alfredo surprised me by coming over at 10 then again at 12 and staying even though he just slept..... ALL DAY grrrr, i left him here and went with julie shopping for new fish :-) good times. then we ended up leavign my house cuz fredo was freaking out! and we were both craving mcdonalds so we got a # 1 and went to his house then i called nicholle to say i couldnt go to movies cuz i had no money at all and i was at fredos till late. but TOMMORW WE SHALL GO so hopefully my brother isnt being gay and wants to leave for camping early. oh yeah me and fredo are going camping! i asked julie to but she has to work on saturday :-( oh well. good times.<3

yesterday was hella fun me and brother and fredo went to modesto to see Makeshift Grey, Aphasia, Grade8, Motograter, Papa Roach and Steve-O!!! steve-o was so drunk he cut up his tongue put lemon in his eyes drank, drank soem more, had some girl kick some guy in the nuts , then the guys from wildboyz came and brought this scorpion and it stung him all in the face lol. then we left cuz it was soooo hot and i hate being short i couldnt breathe down thier in the crowd, so fredo had to hold me up every like 10min to breathe haha. stoped for food then came home. ALL THE BAND WERE SO FUCKING GOOD i liekd then all aphasi was like a reject thursday lol it was funny i liked them though. motograter was awesome NON OF THE GOOD PICS CAME OUT!!! i hate my camera so much they'll end uo showing up liek a month later when i downlaod other pics lol. oh wel. grade8's keyboardist was random as all hell.... i dont even think he played i think he just hit a button to make a soud effect liek the guy in motograter lol. hm he was hot and i got pics with him and the lead singer BUT THEY DIDNT SHOW UP . maybe ill find them later, damn digital technology. oh yeah and my belly button hurts :-(

woke up at 830 showered got all ready wen to alfredos grandparents house then to the bean festival helped his parents pass out A MILLION flyers every car in that parkign lot had a flye on it lol. thne we went to manteca to get alfredos ticket so he can come with me tomorrow :-) then we went to beauty supply and tried on hats , i really want this one and they have awesoem belts there and makeup, which i bought!. it was straight up dark in thuuur to ;-) hahah. then we went back to fredos slept and what not.... then we went back to the bean festival (saw some bia and hella cracked some jokes hehe) meet up with my mom and dad and everyone..... and i got my belly button pierced :-) mom doesnt know.... well im sure she does she just doesnt want to haha. moms psh..... then hung out with nicholle! her parents were there to . MY DAD WAS SO DRUNK hahah it was great and i love fredo around my family, they LOVE him.<3 then i drove everyone home while fredo was in the front he was throwing hotdogs at ppl walking lol my mom was cracking up hahaa. then came here and had a LOVELY time:-))) i love you! <3 p.s. tophers little "show" was HELLA GAY hm yeah wasnt a good idea at all. i wish i wouldnt have went cuz everyones retarded. except joe , hes the only one that actually talks to me still :-/ oh well. alfredo decided he wanted to grab my boobs and take pictures so i was like "WHATEVA" <3 :-)
